channel.title: [PI] Hitsplats wrong / Messed up
channel.description:
Base:Project Insanity
Problem: Say you attack a monster with 50 hitpoints, at random it might deal 20 damage, but the hitsplats show up as a 0( and its in blue colour aswell) however it might be dealing damage. then you might hit a 30 but it shows up as 23 or even 10 or even 0. so no matter how much you hit the hitsplats come up randomly or there might be a sequence to it, i dont know but sometimes you k0 them but the hitsplat shows 0.
[COLOR="Magenta"][SIZE="5"]If you wish to help me over msn Please add [email]yash_thakkar@hotmail.com[/email][/SIZE][/COLOR]

item.title: [PI] Hitsplats wrong / Messed up
item.dc:creator: @yash yash
item.description:
@yash wrote:

Base:Project Insanity

Problem:
Say you attack a monster with 50 hitpoints, at random it might deal 20 damage, but the hitsplats show up as a 0( and its in blue colour aswell) however it might be dealing damage.
then you might hit a 30 but it shows up as 23 or even 10 or even 0. so no matter how much you hit the hitsplats come up randomly or there might be a sequence to it, i dont know but sometimes you k0 them but the hitsplat shows 0.

[COLOR=“Magenta”][SIZE=“5”]If you wish to help me over msn Please add yash_thakkar@hotmail.com[/SIZE][/COLOR]
